name: TYPEFORM__LIST_FORMS
description: Retrieve all forms in the authenticated account with metadata and status information.

name: TYPEFORM__CREATE_FORM
description: Create a new form with questions, design settings, and configuration options.

progress_bar.description: Type of progress bar to show

meta.description: Meta settings for SEO and sharing

allow_indexing.description: Allow search engines to index the form

fields.description: Array of questions/fields in the form

name: TYPEFORM__GET_FORM
description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific form including structure and settings.

form_id.description: ID of the form to retrieve

name: TYPEFORM__UPDATE_FORM
description: Update an existing form's title, settings, questions, and configuration.

form_id.description: ID of the form to update

is_public.description: Whether the form is publicly accessible

name: TYPEFORM__DELETE_FORM
description: Delete a form permanently including all associated responses and data.

form_id.description: ID of the form to delete

name: TYPEFORM__GET_FORM_RESPONSES
description: Retrieve all responses submitted to a form with filtering and pagination options.

form_id.description: ID of the form to get responses for

since.description: Retrieve responses submitted since this date (ISO 8601 format)

until.description: Retrieve responses submitted until this date (ISO 8601 format)

included_response_ids.description: Comma-separated list of response IDs to include

query.description: Search query for filtering responses by answer content

fields.description: Comma-separated list of field IDs to include in response

name: TYPEFORM__DELETE_FORM_RESPONSES
description: Delete specific responses from a form for data cleanup and privacy compliance.

form_id.description: ID of the form to delete responses from

query.description: Query parameters for specifying responses to delete

included_tokens.description: Comma-separated list of response tokens to delete

name: TYPEFORM__GET_FORM_INSIGHTS
description: Retrieve analytics and insights for a form including completion rates and response statistics.

form_id.description: ID of the form to get insights for

name: TYPEFORM__LIST_WORKSPACES
description: Retrieve all workspaces accessible to the authenticated user for organization management.

name: TYPEFORM__CREATE_WORKSPACE
description: Create a new workspace for organizing forms and managing team collaboration.

name: TYPEFORM__GET_WORKSPACE
description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific workspace including members and settings.

workspace_id.description: ID of the workspace to retrieve

name: TYPEFORM__UPDATE_WORKSPACE
description: Update workspace information including name and settings for better organization.

workspace_id.description: ID of the workspace to update

name: TYPEFORM__DELETE_WORKSPACE
description: Delete a workspace permanently including all contained forms and data.

workspace_id.description: ID of the workspace to delete

name: TYPEFORM__LIST_THEMES
description: Retrieve available themes for customizing form appearance and branding.

name: TYPEFORM__CREATE_THEME
description: Create a custom theme for consistent branding across multiple forms.

name: TYPEFORM__GET_THEME
description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific theme including color schemes and fonts.

theme_id.description: ID of the theme to retrieve

name: TYPEFORM__UPDATE_THEME
description: Update an existing theme's colors, fonts, and design elements for brand consistency.

theme_id.description: ID of the theme to update

name: TYPEFORM__DELETE_THEME
description: Delete a custom theme permanently from the account.

theme_id.description: ID of the theme to delete

name: TYPEFORM__LIST_IMAGES
description: Retrieve uploaded images that can be used in forms for enhanced visual design.

name: TYPEFORM__UPLOAD_IMAGE
description: Upload an image file to be used in forms for logos, backgrounds, or question illustrations.

image.description: Image file to upload (JPG, GIF, PNG)

file_name.description: Name for the uploaded image file

name: TYPEFORM__GET_IMAGE
description: Retrieve information about a specific uploaded image including URL and metadata.

image_id.description: ID of the image to retrieve

name: TYPEFORM__DELETE_IMAGE
description: Delete an uploaded image from the account to clean up unused assets.

image_id.description: ID of the image to delete

name: TYPEFORM__CREATE_WEBHOOK_TAG
description: Create webhook tags for organizing and filtering webhook notifications by event types.

webhook_id.description: ID of the webhook to add tags to

tags.description: Array of tag names to add to the webhook

name: TYPEFORM__GET_ACCOUNT_INFO
description: Retrieve account information including plan details, usage limits, and user profile.

name: TYPEFORM__DUPLICATE_FORM
description: Create a copy of an existing form with all questions, settings, and design elements.

form_id.description: ID of the form to duplicate

workspace_href.description: Workspace URL to copy the form to

name: TYPEFORM__GET_FORM_MESSAGES
description: Retrieve customizable messages for a form including welcome screen, thank you page, and error messages.

form_id.description: ID of the form to get messages for

name: TYPEFORM__UPDATE_FORM_MESSAGES
description: Update welcome screens, thank you pages, and other form messages for better user experience.

form_id.description: ID of the form to update messages for

description.description: Description or content for the message

name: TYPEFORM__CREATE_WEBHOOK_ENDPOINT
description: Create a webhook endpoint for receiving real-time form submission notifications.

form_id.description: ID of the form to create webhook for

url.description: URL endpoint to send webhook notifications

name: TYPEFORM__GET_FORM_WEBHOOKS
description: Retrieve all webhook configurations for a specific form to monitor automation setup.

form_id.description: ID of the form to get webhooks for

name: TYPEFORM__DELETE_FORM_WEBHOOK
description: Delete a specific webhook from a form to stop receiving submission notifications.

form_id.description: ID of the form containing the webhook

webhook_tag.description: Tag of the webhook to delete
